fields.description: Window can be split into half and placed adjacent to another half-split window. (Doesn't necessarily have to be half; size can be adjusted)
fields.summary: Android N: Implement support for Split screen mode

comments.body:
https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/8970 is already merged to 6.2.0 when 6.2.0 was master.

Verified SDK 6.2.0.v20170727074842 has this feature.

The split screen mode works as expected. The app can be put in split screen mode & its screen size can be increased or decreased as needed.
Closing.

Studio Ver:     4.9.1.201707200100
SDK Ver:        6.2.0.v20170727074842
OS Ver:         10.12.3
Xcode Ver:      Xcode 8.3.3
Appc NPM:       4.2.9
Appc CLI:       6.2.3-21
Ti CLI Ver:     5.0.14
Alloy Ver:      1.9.13
Node Ver:       6.10.1
Java Ver:       1.8.0_101
Devices:       â‡¨ google Nexus 6P --- Android 7.1.1
